attributes.action: Create a watchdog for hair loss treament products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are many hair loss treatments available including herbs, lotions, laser combs, laser helmets, injections. There should be a trusted watchdog where people can make complaints where products do not work, where the public can view genuine statistics from the watchdog where there would be no bias claims or false statistics.
